name: scrod
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young sea fish, especially a cod, or the flesh of such a fish eaten as food: We had scrod and baked beans for our dinner. The chef will prepare locally caught scrod in a variety of styles. I put the scrod fillets into a baking dish.
More examplesFewer examplesDo you know a place around here where I can get good scrod?He removed the baked scrod from the oven and poured the sauce over it.You can use any fresh fish, such as salmon, scrod, or hake in this recipe.
